title: Meget
description:
Meget is your all-in-one tool for online converting and exporting videos/audio from10,000+ websites, including YouTube, Vimeo, SoundCloud, TikTok, Dailymotion, and many more. You can download and convert multiple videos or audio files at once.
Users can convert media files to various formats such as MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV for videos, and MP3, WAV, FLAC, AAC for audio. Meget allows exporting of videos in resolutions from 360p to 4K and audio at different bitrates.
